title: Elemental Reaction Guide
description:
**__Pyro -> Cryo__** = Strong melt, 2x multiplier.

**__Cryo -> Pyro__** = Weak melt, 1.5x multiplier.

**__Hydro -> Pyro__** = Strong vaporise, 2x multiplier.

**__Pyro -> Hydro__** = Weak vaporise, 1.5x multiplier.

**__Pyro -> Electro__** (or vice versa) = Overload, explosion that knockbacks light/medium enemies and deals dmg in the process.

**__Pyro -> Dendro__** (or vice versa) = Burning, deals Pyro DoT towards the inflicted enemy

**__Hydro -> Electro__** (or vice versa) = Electro-charged, deals Electro DoT and also stuns the enemies + connects to other enemies inflicted with hydro.

**__Cryo -> Electro__** (or vice versa) = Superconduct, deals AoE cryo dmg and reduces enemy physical resistance.

**__Anemo -> Pyro/Hydro/Electro/Cryo__** = Swirl, spreads the element to surrounding enemies while dealing dmg in the process. Can cause [chain reactions](https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/864924254360567841/911320372031393852/image0.png) in the process

**__Geo -> Pyro/Hydro/Electro/Cryo__** = Crystallize, drops a crystal that creates a shield when you pick it up. Has increased dmg absorption against attacks with the respective element geo reacted with.
